name: Nash Patrik
description: Thank you very much! In rishikesh, this is the only place where you can get beautiful makeup and prepare for a photo shoot. Meenu is a very nice woman :)

name: Miriam Barron
description: I was here for a hair wash. Meenu and her team took great care of me and my friend. The salon is well equipped and I was very happy with the result.
